### Load in Libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```

### Read in Dataset

```{r}
mtcars <- datasets::mtcars
```

```{r}
?mtcars
```

LetÊ»s examine the relationship between weight and miles per gallon:

```{r}
mtcars_wt_mpg <- ggplot(data = mtcars, aes(x = mpg, y = wt)) +
  geom_point()

mtcars_wt_mpg
```

```{r}
ggplotly(mtcars_wt_mpg)
```

```{r}
mtcars <- mtcars %>% 
  tibble::rownames_to_column("model")
```

```{r}
mtcars_wt_mpg <- ggplot(data = mtcars, aes(x = mpg, y = wt, label = model, color = hp)) +
  geom_point()

ggplotly(mtcars_wt_mpg)
```
